issues.message: The scene location 'Low-Level Crypts' contradicts the must_stay_true invariant 'location: Oakhaven - Backstreets'.

evidence.excerpt: The stone archway of the Low-Level Crypts didn't so much welcome Artie as it did provide a convenient frame for his inevitable demise.
